short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds rating and duration just below the movie name in Actors/Directors page. Also displays the plot of the movie as tooltip.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds rating(both from IMDB and RottenTomatoes.com) and duration just below the movie name in Actors/Directors page. Also displays the plot of the movie as tooltip.

For any bugs or suggestions, please mail to sridhar.pg@gmail.com
